short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bot for Rogue in stock notification

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bot for tracking restocks of fitness items on roguefitness.com. It runs while your browser is open and will send you push notifications once an item is back in stock. To watch an item, simply visit the product page and click the "RogueBot Notify Me" button
